SEARCH
Package productClasses.Inheritances

Class Book

java.lang.Object
productClasses.Product
productClasses.Inheritances.Book
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Book extends Product implements Serializable
The Book class represents a book product in UniShop. It extends the Product class and includes additional attributes specific to books.
See Also:
